strings.description: A young girl whose story is told in a tale of crystals, from another world. Princess of Bal in the Second World, she is the granddaughter of Galuf, who lovingly raised her after the disappearance of her parents. Fearing for her grandfather after he set off to protect the crystal, she rides a meteorite and travels to Bartz's world on her own, a brave act which awakens Galuf's long-lost memories.
strings.fusion:
If there are any creatures you want to
talk to, I'd be happy to interpret for you!
strings.summon:
Hi! I'm Krile!
I want to fight with you, too!

strings.evolution:
I'll do my best!
If I don't, my grandfather would laugh at me.
strings.affinity:
You can count on me for anything!
I'll do my best to help out!
strings.description: A young girl whose story is told in a tale of crystals, from another world. Krile is granddaughter to Galuf, one of the Warriors of Dawn, and princess of the kingdom of Bal. She joined Bartz and his companions after her grandfather fell in battle at the hands of Exdeath. Having the ability to understand animals and the sort, she is said to have helped facilitate communication between Bartz and his partner Boko, Lenna and her family's wind drakes, and Faris and her sea dragon Syldra.
strings.fusion:
How warm...
I can remember my grandfather...
strings.summon:
I'm not lonely or anything.
Isn't that right, grandfather?

strings.evolution:
Grandpa, give me strength...
I want to protect the Crystals, too!
strings.affinity:
You can count on me for anything!
I'll do my best to help out!
strings.description: A young girl whose story is told in a tale of crystals, from another world. Princess of Bal in the Second World and granddaughter to Galuf, she loses her last remaining blood relative when her grandfather falls in battle to Exdeath. Though grieving his loss, she seems to inherit his power and his purpose, joining Bartz and his friends on their quest. With her curious ability to converse with wind drakes, moogles and other creatures, she proves an invaluable ally to her companions.
strings.fusion:
Hey, I'm grandpa's little girl!
I'm as good at fighting as anyone!
strings.summon:
A voice called me here...at least I think it did.
Maybe I can help you?
